modName: The Lair of the Dark Chrystal and The Village of the Nude UPDATE 3
summary: The Lair of the Dark Chrystal is more sexy than Action.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first Mod for Skyrim, all my other Mods until now, where for Fallout 4, yes i know, it isnt perfect, but for a Beginner its good Work, i think.
The Lair of the Dark Chrystal tells Dovahkin a Story about dishonored and profaned Women, they are forced to Work in the Dungeon/Mine, and that absolute NACKED as Prisoner.
They do everything, Eat,Sleep,Wander around, even a nude Merchant sells you Weapons down there, 2 Enemys await you at the 1st Room, when you enter the Lair.
You got a long Way down, very long, some Mine Ore is inside for you to claim,a Dark Chrystal Treasure Chest with 75.000Gold, for a Good Start as Dragonson :D
The Entrance is opposit Riverwood!!!!
So this is a funny Erotic Adventure,so dont shoot at me pls pls, if not all Girls do 100% what they should do, like go to Bed, the Merchant is a bit silly with that, idk why,but i hope you have anyway much Fun.
I am always open for Help and Tips
I suggest for a sexy Travel inside, Install Calientes Body, so they Girls dont run around in dirty ugly Underwear, ewww hehehe.

Edit:

The Face Colors are fixed, thx CK!
Now you get more to play and Explore, a Bathhouse in Giant Size, a Bar with Merchant (Astridia) who sells good Stuff and a INN with Restaurant, Have Fuuuuuuun Guys.
Installation:

If you install per Hand, Drag and Drop the Mesh and Texture Folders to your Skyrim Data Folder,inside are the Fixed FACES of the Ladys!!!!
Hope you enjoy now you can the Faces are good, can be cause the Interior Light, that it looks different, but its Fixed.

Edit:

Now a New ROOM is there, a Storage Room with Enemies, they wait for you har har.
2 Ultima Weapons wait as Treasure there and the Dragon Ultima Armor.
Enjoy

Edit:

Welcome to the Village of the Nude Tribe, we offer a Nudist Inn and Tavern, were you can Rent a Room, buy Food and enjoy.
Nude Friendly Guards greet ya and all the happy People around have Fun absolute Naaaaked.
Wanna see your Faces, when you see all those funny Names i gave them :D hahaha
Sorry if the Bard Lysette, i duplicated her wont sing, i tryed every Tutorial could find, but seems a Curse lays meanwhile on me :( , i didnt get her to work, maybe some Professional Top Modder can look in the esp and see, why the Bard wont work and also the goods Lady refuses to sell Stuff, well, i followed the Tutorials from DarkFox127, but it dont works, strangely, idk why.
Thx anyway for all help me and gimme Hints to the both Stupid Ladys, who dont wanna do their Job---> Bard and Good Seller.
Tysm Enjoy anyway the Village
author: RetroBabe
